body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Kyle Thomas and the customer's name is Evelyn Rogers.  The conversation is about Mels Cars (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Softwares Unlimited. This is John speaking. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi John, my name is Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I need some help with my account. I'm having trouble logging in.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can definitely help with that. Could I please have your email address associated with the account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. Can you also provide me with your phone number for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's five five five three two one four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thanks for that information. Let me just verify your details... All set! You should now be able to log in without any issues.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's awesome, thank you so much for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Sarah. Thank you for your time and have a wonderful day!
